Flub.Name: Classic
Flub.Description: The old method of generating Fractal Terraces. It provides fewer options, and is mainly provided for backward compatibility with older projects.

Flub.Name: Improved
Flub.Description: The new default method. It provides detailed control over the fractal shape.

Flub.Name: Octaves
Flub.Description: The number of terraces to generate, including subtle sub-terraces based on the space value above.

Flub.Name: Intensity
Flub.Description: The strength of the terracing process. Higher intensities flatten the terrace.

Flub.Name: Shape
Flub.Description: The general shape of the terraces. Lower values create steeper terraces that are closer to the terrain's bulk, while higher create smoother terraces that protrude outward.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
